languages.text: "Вы не представляете, сколь утомительным было ожидание сего момента".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не вредставляете, сколь утомильным было ожидание сего момента".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."
languages.original_text: "Вы не представляете, сколь утомительным было ожидание сего момента".

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how exhausting it was to endure until this moment."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how exhausting it was to endure until this moment."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “您恐怕想象不到，我等这一刻已经等了多久。”
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: “您恐怕想象不到，我等这一刻已经等了多久。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No puede ni imaginar el tedio de esperar este momento».
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: «No puede ni imaginar el tedio de esperar este momento».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この瞬間を待つことの退屈さ、想像もつかないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: 「この瞬間を待つことの退屈さ、想像もつかないでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie langweilig es war, auf diesen Augenblick zu warten."
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie langweilig es war, auf diesen Augenblick zu warten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas comme j'ai attendu ce moment. »
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas comme j'ai attendu ce moment. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu anı beklemek beni ne kadar yordu, tahmin bile edemezsin."
languages.original_text: "The tedium of waiting for this moment, you cannot imagine."

traits.locale_text: "Bu anı beklemek beni ne kadar yordu, tahmin bile edemezsin."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
